devdoc.details: If you plan to do some changes to a system governed by this project you should write a contract that does those changes, like a recipe. This contract MUST not have ANY kind of public or external function that modifies the state of this ChangeContract, otherwise you could run into front-running issues when the governance system is fully in place.
devdoc.title: ChangeContract

execute().notice: Override this function with a recipe of the changes to be done when this ChangeContract is executed

userdoc.notice: This interface is the one used by the governance system.
